hero.subtitle: Available now!
hero.title: Challenges that last.
hero.description: Take on exciting challenges with the cappic app and capture your experiences—alone, as a couple, or with friends. Choose your favorite categories, document special moments with photos, and break free from your daily routine!

introduction.title: Experience unforgettable moments with the cappic app!
introduction.description: Create and complete exciting photo challenges—alone, with friends, family, or your partner. Our app makes capturing and sharing special moments fun and interactive. Get inspired, try something new, and collect valuable memories! Whether it’s fun tasks, creative snapshots, or shared adventures—our challenges help you escape the ordinary and strengthen your relationships.
